forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. Northwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a soft veil of mostly cloudy skies blankets the city, the air crisp and cool, wrapping around you like a gentle whisper of late winter. The temperature hovers around 47, with a modest northwest breeze offering just a hint of warmth. The city lights begin to twinkle like distant stars, casting a serene glow against the encroaching night, while the vast expanse of the Pacific glimmers subtly to the west, hinting at the mysteries it holds.

Looking to tomorrow's dawn, the forecast promises a leisurely embrace of sunshine, a refreshing reprieve where the high climbs near 56 before gently easing back to an afternoon coolness of about 54. With the north-northeast wind dancing lightly at 2 to 6 mph, there will be some clarity in the air, though the lingering marine layer may still wrap around the edges of the bay. It’s the kind of day to venture out, perhaps across one of the many bridges or along the tranquil waterfront paths, where the splendor of the day can be absorbed fully. Dress in layers to acclimate to the shifting temperatures, a cozy sweater or light jacket as comforting companions. The world beckons, from quiet cafes to leisurely strolls through city parks, inviting you to savor the unfolding beauty of another day in this storied place.
